Detailed Description

Abstract base class used for representing an object that is writing or reading to/from a file.

This object defines the specifications for chaos::io::sys::FileReader and chaos::io::sys::FileWriter.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

chaos::io::sys::FileHandle::FileHandle ( chaos::uint32  flags = 0U)
protected

Default super constructor.

Super constructor used to create a new unopened file handle.

Parameters
flagsFlags used to describe how the file handle should be opened.
chaos::io::sys::FileHandle::FileHandle ( const chaos::io::sys::Path &  path,
chaos::uint32  flags = 0U 
)
protected

Path super constructor.

This does not open the File Handle. But the derived constructors for chaos::io::sys::FileReader and chaos::io::sys::FileWriter will open the file handle.

Parameters
pathPath to the file to open.
flagsFlags used to describe how the file handle should be opened.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void chaos::io::sys::FileHandle::open ( )
pure virtual

Opens the file handle to the internal path.

Note
This function is to be implemented by derived classes.
Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is already open.
chaos::io::sys::InvalidPathErrorIf the path cannot be opened

Implemented in chaos::io::sys::FileWriter.

virtual void chaos::io::sys::FileHandle::open ( const chaos::io::sys::Path &  path)
virtual

Sets the path and opens this handle to it.

This function is short hand for:

my_file_handle.set_path( m_path );
my_file_handle.open();
Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is already open.
chaos::io::sys::InvalidPathErrorIf the path cannot be opened

Reimplemented in chaos::io::sys::FileWriter.

virtual void chaos::io::sys::FileHandle::close ( )
pure virtual

Closes this file handle.

Note
This function is to be implemented by derived classes.

Implemented in chaos::io::sys::FileWriter.

virtual void chaos::io::sys::FileHandle::set_path ( const chaos::io::sys::Path &  path)
virtual

Sets the path to be used by this file handle.

The path may only be set if the file handle is not currently open.

Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is open.
virtual void chaos::io::sys::FileHandle::set_flags ( chaos::uint32  flags)
virtual

Sets the descriptor flags to be used by this file handle.

Flags can only be set if the file handle is not currently open.

Exceptions
chaos::ex::StateErrorIf this file handle is open.
